videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns gets out in transition for the flush.

videos.description: Karl-Anthony Towns drives into the lane and gets the lay-in to go through some touch defending.

videos.description: Naz Reid has no trouble jumping over and through Maxi Kleber for the one-handed jam.
